Uses of Class
oracle.pgx.api.PgxCollection

  • Packages that use PgxCollection 
    Package Description
    oracle.pgx.api
    This package contains the main Java APIs.

    • Uses of PgxCollection in oracle.pgx.api

      Subclasses of PgxCollection in oracle.pgx.api 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ComponentCollection<ID> 
      class  EdgeCollection
      A collection of edges.
      class  EdgeSequence
      An ordered sequence of edges which may contain duplicates.
      class  EdgeSet
      An unordered set of edges (no duplicates).
      class  VertexCollection<ID>
      A collection of vertices.
      class  VertexSequence<ID>
      An ordered sequence of vertices which may contain duplicates.
      class  VertexSet<ID>
      An unordered set of vertices (no duplicates).
